arts.ttl: Vicko Sevelj relives Dundee United nightmare debut at Falkirk as defender relishes Premiership opener
arts.sum: The former Croatia youth international has bad memories of facing the Bairns on the road

arts.ttl: Kilmarnock vs Livingston predictions: Cagey affair expected at Rugby Park
arts.sum: Kilmarnock and Livingston tend to put on low-scoring affairs when they meet and Joe Casey is expecting more of the same when the pair face off in the first game of the new Scottish Premiership season.

The last two Scottish Championship champions go head-to-head on the opening weekend of the new Scottish Premiership season, as Falkirk host Dundee United on Sunday afternoon. The last two seasons hav...
